meanings.definition: Of or relating to a father
meanings.sent1: His paternal advice always guided me in the right direction.
meanings.sent2: The paternal figure in the family was always supportive and caring.
meanings.sent3: The paternal jokes at the family dinner always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: His paternal presence was like a sturdy oak tree in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of his paternal hug was comforting and reassuring.

meanings.sent1: Her paternal instincts kicked in when she saw the child in danger.
meanings.sent2: The man's paternal nature shone through as he played with his kids.
meanings.sent3: The paternal pride in his son's achievements was evident to all.
meanings.sent4: His paternal authority was unquestioned by his children.
meanings.sent5: The paternal love he showed was unwavering and unconditional.

meanings.definition: Inherited or received from a father
meanings.sent1: She inherited her paternal grandfather's love for gardening.
meanings.sent2: The family heirloom was a paternal gift passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The paternal traits in him were unmistakably from his father.
meanings.sent4: His paternal surname connected him to his ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The paternal wisdom he possessed was a gift from his father.
